Region III NAEB Conference
March 17-19* 1963
Center for Continuing Education
The University of Chicago
Sunday* March 17
4- 6 p. m. Registration
4s00 p. m. Meeting of group leaders for Monday sessions
5- 6 p. m. Cocktail party
6:00 p. m. Open Dinner Hour
8:00 p.m. Opening Session: Keynote Speech
Monday* March 18
S:30 a. m. .Registration continues
9:00 a.m. Concurrent Sessions:
Session A - Administering Educational Broadcasting
Session B - Educational Broadcasting Facilities; A Technical
Session
10:00 a. m. Coffee
10:30 a. m. Concurrent Discussion Groups
4 A groups - Administration; 4 B groups * Facilities
12:30 p.m. Bunch eon; Discussion: Promoting Educational Broadcasting
__Speakers: Ed Morris* Director of Development* WTTW /
Channel Hi. Chicago* and Chet Campbell* Manager
of Promotion and Advertising* National Broadcasting
Company;, Chicago
2:15 p.m. Concurrent Sessions;
Session C - The Heart of Broadcasting: The Program
Session D - Relationships in Educational Broadcasting
3:15 p.m. Coffee

4 G groups - Programming; 4 D groups - Relationships
